Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements for the final image:

*   Category axis
*   Value axis
*   Category axis title (e.g., "Fruit" or similar text indicating the categories)
*   Value axis title (e.g., "Number of Students" or similar text indicating the values)
*   "Apple" label on category axis
*   "Banana" label on category axis
*   "Orange" label on category axis
*   "Grapes" label on category axis
*   "Watermelon" label on category axis
*   Rectangular bar for "Apple" category, scaled to represent value 6
*   Rectangular bar for "Banana" category, scaled to represent value 5
*   Rectangular bar for "Orange" category, scaled to represent value 4
*   Rectangular bar for "Grapes" category, scaled to represent value 3
*   Rectangular bar for "Watermelon" category, scaled to represent value 2
*   Numerical scale markings on value axis (e.g., 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
*   Tick marks on value axis
*   Chart title (e.g., "Preferred Fruits Among 20 Students" or similar text conveying the chart's subject)
